  • Method Details

    • readUrl

      public java.lang.String readUrl() throws java.lang.Exception
      this function open connection with url and return a ype of this url
      Returns:
      the content type of the given url
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - in case of troubles to open connection to this url

    • isInto

      private void isInto() throws java.net.MalformedURLException
      this function use jsoup to open connection with url and for "i" command extract all img tag and for "w" and "l" extract all text
      Throws:
      java.net.MalformedURLException - if the url is not valid

    • getHtmlString

      public java.lang.String getHtmlString() throws java.net.MalformedURLException
      this function call to the "isInto" function to extract the html text and return it
      Returns:
      string of all text in the html page
      Throws:
      java.net.MalformedURLException - if the url is not correct

    • getImage

      public org.jsoup.select.Elements getImage() throws java.net.MalformedURLException
      this function call to the "isInto" function to get all image tag of the html code and return it
      Returns:
      all tag element of kind "image" of the html page
      Throws:
      java.net.MalformedURLException - if the url is not vallid
